TopicTitle: i dont have steam ksp... how do i update???

Articles.Content: I have a non steam ksp v1.0.4 and I want to update how can I???

41 minutes ago, KSPISCLEARLYAMILSIM said:

I have a non steam ksp v1.0.4 and I want to update how can I???

If you bought it from the KSP Store, then you need to go back to the store and log in using whatever account you used to buy KSP in the first place.  Once you log in, it should take you to the 'Your Orders' page, which will include a list of what you've bought from Squad (which, considering the version you're using, should be just KSP itself and no DLC).  Next to the description will be a 'Download' button, which is the button you use to get updates.

Incidentally, welcome to the forum!  If you need any help, then please don't hesitate to ask--we've got a lot of people here who love to do exactly that.

Edited August 1, 2019 by Zhetaan

Hello, and welcome to the forums! 

Moving to Kerbal Network, since it's about purchasing the game rather than the gameplay itself.
